pageContext.description: Discs are ornamented on their inner sides with 2 raised lines.
pageContext.associations: Found with 4 gold bracelet-shaped penannular rings with cup shaped ends. Nos. 317, 308, 311 (3rd class), 307 (2nd class), Plate XVI.
